description:
Yukiatsu is reunited with his mother, who urges him to return to the House and take the place of the missing adopted son. Ogasawara persuades Yukiatsu to accept this proposal. The other Ayashi try to capture the boy claiming to be Yukiatsu Ryudo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 不忍池子守唄(しのばずいけのこもりうた)
